meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2558.

div.div:
Paul Thompson game 4.
Tape missing player introductions.

td.p: Allen Rudolph, a high school teacher from Los Gatos, California
Paul Thompson, from Cheverly, Maryland (whose 3-day cash winnings total $43,600)

tr.td: BAYS & GULFS
CELEBRITY CHEERLEADERS
DANCE
GRAVESITES
ZOOLOGY
RHYME TIME

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Allen Rudolph had $5,200. Did he come up with the correct response?)
(Allen: Wrong ocean.)
(Alex: You moved Morocco to the Caribbean. That\'s a nice transition. It\'ll cost you, obviously.)
PatrickWhat is Belize
$1,000
AllenWhat is Morocco
$5,195
PaulWhat is the Dominican Republic?
$500
the Dominican Republic')
